elements.placeholder: data_in = db_utils.query(conn, 'select '+  field1 + field2 + ' from ' + inputs['input1']);return(data_in)
elements.value:
data = db_utils.query(conn,'select * from '+inputs['input1'])
    
    import warnings
    warnings.filterwarnings("ignore")
    
    # 删除热水器编号，有无水流，节能模式
    data.drop(labels = ["id","flow","eco_mode"],
    axis = 1,inplace = True)
    
    data['time'] = pd.to_datetime(data['time'], 
    format = '%Y%m%d%H%M%S')
    data['time'] = data['time'].astype('str')
    
    return(data)

nodes.description: Python脚本是指可直接将Python脚本按照一定格式粘贴至脚本区作为组件运行。
nodes.name: 字段提取及转换

elements.toolTip: data_in = db_utils.query(conn, 'select '+  field1 + field2 + ' from ' + inputs['input1']);return(data_in);注意每行代码需要缩进4个空格
elements.label: 脚本
elements.name: content
elements.placeholder: data_in = db_utils.query(conn, 'select '+  field1 + field2 + ' from ' + inputs['input1']);return(data_in)
elements.value:
data = db_utils.query(conn,'select * from '+inputs['input1'])
    import numpy as np
    threshold = pd.Timedelta('4 min') #阈值为分钟
    data['time'] = pd.to_datetime(data['time'], 
    format = '%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') # 转换时间格式
    data = data[data['volume_water'] > 0] #只要流量大于0的记录
    #相邻时间向前差分，比较是否大于阈值
    sjKs = data['time'].diff() > threshold 
    sjKs.iloc[0] = True # 令第一个时间为第一个用水事件的开始事件
    sjJs = sjKs.iloc[1:] # 向后差分的结果
    # 令最后一个时间作为最后一个用水事件的结束时间
    sjJs = pd.concat([sjJs,pd.Series(True)]) 
    # 创建数据框，并定义用水事件序列
    sj = pd.DataFrame(np.arange(1,sum(sjKs)+1),columns = ["event_id"]) 
    sj["start_id"] = data.index[sjKs == 1]+1 # 定义用水事件的起始编号
    sj["end_id"] = data.index[sjJs == 1]+1  # 定义用水事件的终止编号

    return(sj)

nodes.description: Python脚本是指可直接将Python脚本按照一定格式粘贴至脚本区作为组件运行。
nodes.name: 定义用水事件

elements.toolTip: data_in = db_utils.query(conn, 'select '+  field1 + field2 + ' from ' + inputs['input1']);return(data_in);注意每行代码需要缩进4个空格
elements.label: 脚本
elements.name: content
elements.placeholder: data_in = db_utils.query(conn, 'select '+  field1 + field2 + ' from ' + inputs['input1']);return(data_in)
elements.value:
sj = db_utils.query(conn,'select * from '+inputs['input1'])
    data = db_utils.query(conn,'select * from '+inputs['input2'])
    
    import numpy as np
    data['time'] = pd.to_datetime(data['time'], 
    format = '%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') # 转换时间格式
    
    # 构造特征：总用水时长
    timeDel = pd.Timedelta("1 sec")
    sj["start_time"] = (data.loc[sj["start_id"]-1,'time'] - timeDel).values
    sj["end_time"] = (data.loc[sj["end_id"]-1,'time'] + timeDel).values
    sj['washing_time'] = sj["start_time"].dt.hour
    tmp1 = sj["end_time"] - sj["start_time"]
    sj["whole_time"] = np.int64(tmp1)/1000000000 
    
    # 构造用水停顿事件
    # 构造特征“停顿开始时间”、“停顿结束时间”
    # 停顿开始时间指从有水流到无水流，停顿结束时间指从无水流到有水流
    for i in range(len(data)-1):
        if (data.loc[i,"volume_water"] != 0) & (data.loc[i + 1,"volume_water"] == 0) :
            data.loc[i + 1,"stop_start_time"] = data.loc[i +1, "time"] - timeDel
        if (data.loc[i,"volume_water"] == 0) & (data.loc[i + 1,"volume_water"] != 0) :
            data.loc[i,"stop_end_time"] = data.loc[i , "time"] + timeDel
    # 提取停顿开始时间与结束时间所对应行号，放在数据框Stop中
    indStopStart = data.index[data["stop_start_time"].notnull()]+1
    indStopEnd = data.index[data["stop_end_time"].notnull()]+1
    Stop = pd.DataFrame(data = {"stop_start_id":indStopStart[:-1],
                            "stop_end_id":indStopEnd[1:]}) 
    # 计算停顿时长，并放在数据框stop中，停顿时长=停顿结束时间-停顿结束时间
    tmp2 = data.loc[indStopEnd[1:]-1,"stop_end_time"]
    tmp3 = data.loc[indStopStart[:-1]-1,"stop_start_time"]
    tmp4 = tmp2.values-tmp3.values
    Stop["stop_period"] = np.int64(tmp4)/1000000000 
    # 将每次停顿与事件匹配,停顿的开始时间要大于事件的开始时间，
    # 且停顿的结束时间要小于事件的结束时间
    for i in range(len(sj)):
        Stop.loc[(Stop["stop_start_id"] > sj.loc[i,"start_id"]) & 
        (Stop["stop_end_id"] < sj.loc[i,"end_id"]),
            "stop_belong_event"] = i+1
             
    # 删除停顿次数为0的事件
    Stop = Stop[Stop["stop_belong_event"].notnull()]

    # 构造特征 用水事件停顿总时长、停顿次数、停顿平均时长、
    # 用水时长，用水/总时长
    stopAgg =  Stop.groupby("stop_belong_event").agg({"stop_period":sum,
    "stop_start_id":len})
    sj.loc[stopAgg.index - 1,"sum_stop_period"] = stopAgg.loc[:,"stop_period"].values 
    sj.loc[stopAgg.index-1,"stop_num"] = stopAgg.loc[:,"stop_start_id"].values
    sj.fillna(0,inplace=True) # 对缺失值用0插补
    stopNo0 = sj["stop_num"] != 0 # 判断用水事件是否存在停顿
    sj.loc[stopNo0,"mean_stop_period"] = \
    sj.loc[stopNo0,"sum_stop_period"]/sj.loc[stopNo0,"stop_num"] 
    sj.fillna(0,inplace=True) # 对缺失值用0插补
    sj["water_time"] = sj["whole_time"] - sj["sum_stop_period"] # 定义特征用水时长
    # 定义特征 用水/总时长
    sj["perc_water_time"] = sj["water_time"] / sj["whole_time"]
    
    
    data["volume_water"] = data["volume_water"] / 60 # 原单位L/min，现转换为L/sec
    sj["sum_volume_water"] = 0 # 给总用水量赋一个初始值0
    for i in range(len(sj)):
        Start = sj.loc[i,"start_id"]-1
        End = sj.loc[i,"end_id"]-1
        if Start != End:
            for j in range(Start,End):
                if data.loc[j,"volume_water"] != 0:
                    sj.loc[i,"sum_volume_water"] = (data.loc[j + 1,"time"] - 
                    data.loc[j,"time"]).seconds* data.loc[j,"volume_water"] + sj.loc[i,"sum_volume_water"]
            sj.loc[i,"sum_volume_water"] = sj.loc[i,"sum_volume_water"] + data.loc[End,"volume_water"] * 2
        else:
            sj.loc[i,"sum_volume_water"] = data.loc[Start,"volume_water"] * 2
        
    sj["mean_volume_water"] = sj["sum_volume_water"] / sj["water_time"] # 定义特征 平均水流量
    # 构造特征：水流量波动
    # 水流量波动=∑(((单次水流的值-平均水流量)^2)*持续时间)/用水时长
    sj["volatility_volume_water"] = 0 # 给水流量波动赋一个初始值0
    for i in range(len(sj)):
        Start = sj.loc[i,"start_id"] - 1
        End = sj.loc[i,"end_id"] - 1
        for j in range(Start,End + 1):
            if data.loc[j,"volume_water"] != 0:
                slbd = (data.loc[j,"volume_water"] - sj.loc[i,"mean_volume_water"])**2
                slsj = (data.loc[j + 1,"time"] -  data.loc[j,"time"]).seconds
                sj.loc[i,"volatility_volume_water"] =  slbd * slsj + sj.loc[i,"volatility_volume_water"]
        sj.loc[i,"volatility_volume_water"] =  sj.loc[i,"volatility_volume_water"] / sj.loc[i,"water_time"]

    # 构造特征：停顿时长波动
    # 停顿时长波动=∑(((单次停顿时长-平均停顿时长)^2)*持续时间)/总停顿时长
    sj["volatility_stop_time"] = 0 # 给停顿时长波动赋一个初始值0
    for i in range(len(sj)):
        # 当停顿次数为0或1时，停顿时长波动值为0，故排除
        if sj.loc[i,"stop_num"] > 1:
            for j in Stop.loc[Stop["stop_belong_event"] == (i+1),"stop_period"].values:
                sj.loc[i,"volatility_stop_time"] = ((j - sj.loc[i,"mean_stop_period"])**2) * j + sj.loc[i,"volatility_stop_time"]
            sj.loc[i,"volatility_stop_time"] = sj.loc[i,"volatility_stop_time"] / sj.loc[i,"sum_stop_period"]
    
    return(sj)

elements.value:
sj = db_utils.query(conn,'select * from '+inputs['input1'])
    
    sj_bool = (sj['water_time'] >100) & (sj['whole_time'] > 120) & (sj['sum_volume_water'] > 5)
    sj_final = sj.loc[sj_bool,:]
    
    return(sj_final)
